meanings.definition: Achieved a desired aim or result.
meanings.sent1: She succeeded in finishing her homework on time.
meanings.sent2: The team succeeded in winning the championship.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel succeeded in reaching the very top of the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her determination succeeded in overcoming all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The plant succeeded in blooming beautifully despite the dry weather.

meanings.sent1: The succeeded steps led to the final destination.
meanings.sent2: The succeeded chapters of the book were captivating.
meanings.sent3: The succeeded colors in the painting created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent4: The succeeded days of the week passed quickly.
meanings.sent5: The succeeded pieces of the puzzle fit perfectly together.

meanings.definition: Inherited a title, office, or estate.
meanings.sent1: He succeeded his father as the CEO of the company.
meanings.sent2: She succeeded her grandmother's antique collection.
meanings.sent3: The cat succeeded the cozy spot by the fireplace.
meanings.sent4: The young prince succeeded the throne after his father.
meanings.sent5: The eldest son succeeded the family farm as per tradition.
